extraction.title: Link to docs from within the apps
extraction.comments: Sure, no problem. I can add a link to the Android GH wiki if that is of any help. Would you suggest any additional information on the Play Store description or the wiki to get users started? For the link in the app: make sure it says 'Documentation'.For the Play Store: how about something like "OwnTracks requires an MQTT server (broker?), either existing or your own." - perhaps even with a link to the Wiki so people know what they are getting into.
